name: Clen and Friends Remake
description:
ENG:Story

you were hired as a night watchman in a clen and friends restaurant, your goal is to watch animatronics and many more, clen is waiting for you there...

BR:História

você foi contratado para vigia noturna num restaurante de clen and Friends,seu objetivo é vigiar animatronics e muitos mais, clen está te esperando lá... #fnaf #fangame
